analyzed: 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: mig la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no // sna la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: lce la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: lus la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not conceptualize the body.

original: yid la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not a mental construct.

original: gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not a concept about form.

original: sgra la @448b rtog pa ma yin no //üîΩdri la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra la @448b rtog pa ma yin no // dri la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: ro la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: reg la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: chos la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no // sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not a concept about ear consciousness.üîΩIt is not a concept about nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no //

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no //üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no //

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no //

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not conceptualize the contact that is the coming together of body and tactile objects.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no //

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no //

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not conceptualize the sensation that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of body, tactile objects, and body consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no //

original: sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no //

original: chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no // sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: len pa la rtog pa ma yin no // srid pa la rtog pa ma yin no //

original: sgra nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩdri nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩro nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

translated: Sound itself is the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩSmell itself is the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩTaste itself is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: reg nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: reg nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: chos nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: Phenomena themselves are the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩEye consciousness itself is the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @452b nyid do //

analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the tongue consciousness is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: Eye contact is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: ear contact is also the knowledge of all aspects;üîΩnose contact is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: tongue contact is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the sensory contact of the mind is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact via the eye is also the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact via the ear is also the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact via the nose is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact via the tongue is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact via the body is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact via the mind is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: sa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The earth element is also the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: chu'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams @453a *//
translated: The element of water itself is alsoüîΩ

original: cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the water element is the knowledge of all aspects;

original: me'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩrlung gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: me'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // rlung gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the fire element is the knowledge of all aspects;üîΩthe wind element is the knowledge of all aspects;

original: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: Ignorance is the knowledge of all aspects;

analyzed: 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: volitional factors are the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: consciousness is the knowledge of all aspects;

original: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: contact is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: feeling is also the knowledge of all aspects;

analyzed: sred pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // len pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: craving is also the knowledge of all aspects;üîΩgrasping is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: becoming is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: birth is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rga shi nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: rga shi nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: aging and death is also the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the perfection of moral discipline is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the perfection of patience is also the knowledge of all aspects;üîΩthe perfection of effort is also the knowledge of all aspects;üîΩthe perfection of meditation is also the knowledge of all aspects;üîΩthe perfection of wisdom is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol @453b tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol @453b tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩnang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

translated: the perfection of wisdom is also the knowledge of all aspects;üîΩinner emptiness is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: outer emptiness is also the knowledge of all aspects;üîΩinner and outer emptiness is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: great emptiness is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of nonapprehension is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad @454a *//üîΩmkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad @454a *// mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //üîΩrdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The right efforts are also the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe legs of miraculous power are also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The faculties are also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

original: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The branches of enlightenment are also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the noble eightfold path is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the noble truths are also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: meditative absorption is also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: tshad med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshad med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the immeasurables are also the knowledge of all aspects;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: mngon par @454b shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: Subh≈´ti, it is because the suchness of form and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.üîΩThe suchness of feeling and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de @455a *//

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //

translated: The suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //üîΩchos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de @459a *//üîΩbzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness, signless, and wishless gates of liberation and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: The suchness of the clairvoyances and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: The suchness of the meditative stabilizations and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: The suchness of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @460b nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: The suchness of the powers of the tathƒÅgatas and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

translated: The suchness of the fearlessnesses and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //üîΩbyams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o // byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: The suchness of the analytical knowledges and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.üîΩThe suchness of the great love and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: The suchness of the great compassion and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o //

translated: The suchness of the distinct attributes of a buddha and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines,

original: le'u sum cu bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u sum cu bdun pa'o ////

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya nyer drug pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya nyer drug pa //
translated: Volume 226

analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsandan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog autpa la dang / padmo dang / ku mu da dang / punda ri ka mang po khyer te / bcom @461a *// ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to //
translated: Then the sons of the gods who live in the desire realm and the form realm brought divine sandalwood powder and many divine utpala, padma, kumuda, and pu·πá·∏çarƒ´ka flowers.üîΩThey scattered them in the direction of the Blessed One.

original: gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
analyzed: gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
translated: Having scattered them, they went to where the Blessed One was.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
translated: They bowed their heads at the Blessed One's two feet and sat to one side.

original: 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis /üîΩbcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: While sitting there, the sons of the gods who live in the desire realm and the form realmüîΩsaid this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One!

analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du /üîΩgzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du / gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: in this profound perfection of wisdom have saidüîΩthat form itself is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so //üîΩtshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so // tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is form.üîΩFeeling itself is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //üîΩ'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o // 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so //

original: 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //üîΩrnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is consciousness.

original: mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The eyes themselves are the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go /üîΩrna ba nyid rnam pa thams @461b cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go / rna ba nyid rnam pa thams @461b cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the eye.üîΩThe ear is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o //üîΩsna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o // sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the ear.üîΩThe nose is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o //üîΩlce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o // lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the nose.üîΩThe tongue is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o //üîΩlus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o // lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the tongue.üîΩThe body is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so //üîΩyid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so // yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the body.üîΩThe mind is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do //üîΩgzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do // gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the mind.üîΩForm is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so //üîΩsgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so // sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is form.üîΩSound is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is sound.

original: dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Smell itself is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o //üîΩro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o // ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o //üîΩreg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o // reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Omniscience itself is taste.üîΩTouch itself is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go /üîΩchos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go / chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so //üîΩmig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so // mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Omniscience itself is phenomena.üîΩEye consciousness itself is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩrna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna @462a *//üîΩba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna @462a *// ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Omniscience itself is ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Nose consciousness itself is omniscience.

original: rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩlce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o // lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩlus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o // lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is the tongue consciousness.üîΩThe body consciousness is the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩyid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o // yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is the body consciousness.üîΩThe mind consciousness is the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o /üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o / mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is the mind consciousness.üîΩThe sensory element of the eyes is the knowledge of all aspects;üîΩthe knowledge of all aspects is the sensory element of the eyes.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //üîΩlce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is also the contact of the nose.üîΩThe very contact of the tongue is the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //üîΩlus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa @462b thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The sense field of gustatory consciousness is the knowledge of all aspects,üîΩand the knowledge of all aspects is the sense field of gustatory consciousness.üîΩThe sense field of tactile consciousness is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //üîΩlus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //üîΩlus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //üîΩyid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is the sense of body‚Äôs contact.üîΩThe sense of mind‚Äôs contact is the knowledge of all aspects,

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so // chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @463a *//
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is the earth element.üîΩThe water element is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: pa ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so //üîΩme'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: pa ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so // me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is the water element.üîΩThe fire element is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so //üîΩrlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so // rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is the fire element.üîΩThe wind element is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The space element is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so // rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the space element.üîΩThe consciousness element is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so //üîΩma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so // ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the consciousness element.üîΩIgnorance is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //üîΩ'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o // 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is ignorance.üîΩFormations are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //üîΩrnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is formations.üîΩConsciousness is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o // ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is consciousness.üîΩName and form are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is name and form.

original: skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The six sense fields are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go /üîΩreg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go / reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the six sense fields.üîΩContact is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @463b pa nyid kyang reg pa'o //üîΩtshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @463b pa nyid kyang reg pa'o // tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is contact.üîΩSensation is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //üîΩsred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o // sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is sensation.üîΩCraving is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o //üîΩlen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o // len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is craving.üîΩClinging is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o //üîΩsrid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o // srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is clinging.üîΩBecoming is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o //üîΩskye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o // skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is becoming.üîΩBirth is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is birth.

original: rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: old age and death itself is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o //üîΩsbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects itself is old age and death.üîΩThe perfection of giving itself is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩtshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects itself is the perfection of giving.üîΩThe perfection of morality itself is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects itself is the perfection of morality.üîΩThe perfection of patience itself is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩbrtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects itself is the perfection of patience.üîΩThe perfection of effort itself is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects itself is the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /üîΩrnam pa thams @464a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste / rnam pa thams @464a *//
translated: The perfection of meditative stabilization is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the perfection of meditative stabilization.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩnang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the perfection of wisdom.üîΩInner emptiness is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //üîΩphyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do // phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is inner emptiness.üîΩOuter emptiness is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do //üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do // phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is outer emptiness.üîΩInner and outer emptiness is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of the great is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do //üîΩdon dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do // don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of the great.üîΩThe emptiness of the ultimate is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of the ultimate.üîΩThe emptiness of the compounded is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of the compounded.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of the uncompounded is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: mtha' las 'das @464b pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das @464b pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of the unlimited.üîΩThe emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩdor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.üîΩThe emptiness of non-rejection is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩrang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of non-rejection.üîΩThe emptiness of inherent existence is the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of all things is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //üîΩrang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of its own mark.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of nonthings.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa @465a *//üîΩthams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa @465a *//üîΩthams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //üîΩdran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the applications of mindfulness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //üîΩyang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so // yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the right efforts.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so //üîΩrdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The right efforts are the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the legs of miraculous power.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //üîΩdbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so // dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The legs of miraculous power are the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the faculties.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so //
translated: The faculties are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the powers.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so //üîΩbyang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so // byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The powers are the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe limbs of awakening are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //üîΩ'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the limbs of awakening.üîΩThe noble eightfold path is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //üîΩ'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the noble eightfold path.üîΩThe noble truths are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //üîΩbsam gtan @465b nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so // bsam gtan @465b nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the noble truths.üîΩThe concentrations are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so //üîΩtshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so // tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the concentrations.üîΩThe immeasurables are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The formless absorptions are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //üîΩrnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so // rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the formless absorptions.üîΩLiberation is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so //üîΩmthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is liberation.üîΩThe serial absorptions are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //üîΩrnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the serial absorptions.üîΩThe emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The superknowledges are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so //üîΩting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

analyzed: lha'i bu dag /

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /

analyzed: lha'i bu dag / gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so //üîΩtshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so // tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //üîΩ'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so // 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //üîΩrnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects itself is disposition.üîΩConsciousness itself is the knowledge of all aspects;

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o // mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects itself is the eyes.

original: rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o //üîΩsna nyid rnam pa thams @476a *//üîΩcad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o // sna nyid rnam pa thams @476a *// cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The ear is omniscience.üîΩThe nose is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o //üîΩlce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o // lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The nose is omniscience.üîΩThe tongue is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o //üîΩlus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o // lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The tongue is omniscience.üîΩThe body is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so //üîΩyid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so // yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The body is omniscience.üîΩThe mind is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do //üîΩgzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do // gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The mind is omniscience.üîΩForm is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so //üîΩsgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so // sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Form is omniscience.üîΩSound is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o //üîΩdri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o // dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Sound is omniscience.üîΩSmell is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o //
translated: Smell is omniscience.

original: ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
