original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o //üîΩreg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o // reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Omniscience itself is taste.üîΩTouch itself is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go /üîΩchos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go / chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Omniscience itself is touch.üîΩPhenomena themselves are omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so //üîΩmig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so // mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Omniscience itself is phenomena.üîΩEye consciousness itself is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩrna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Omniscience itself is eye consciousness.üîΩEar consciousness itself is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩsna'i @476b rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o // sna'i @476b rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Omniscience itself is ear consciousness.üîΩNose consciousness itself is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Omniscience itself is nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The tongue consciousness itself is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩlus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o // lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects itself is the tongue consciousness.üîΩThe body consciousness itself is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩyid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o // yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects itself is the body consciousness.üîΩThe mind consciousness itself is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects itself is the mind consciousness.üîΩEye contact itself is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects itself is eye contact.üîΩEar contact itself is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects itself is ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The nose sense-sphere is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //üîΩlce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the nose sense-sphere.üîΩThe tongue sense-sphere is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //üîΩlus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the tongue sense-sphere.üîΩThe body sense-sphere is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //üîΩyid kyi 'dus te reg pa @477a *//üîΩnyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa @477a *// nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the body sense-sphere.üîΩThe mind sense-sphere is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the mind sense-sphere.üîΩThe feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The sense field of phenomena is the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the sense field of phenomena.üîΩThe sense field of sights is the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the sense field of sights.üîΩThe sense field of sounds is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the sense field of sounds.üîΩThe sense field of smells is the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the sense field of smells.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //üîΩlce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The sense field of tastes is the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the sense field of tastes.üîΩThe sense field of tangibles is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //üîΩlus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the sense field of tangibles.üîΩThe sense field of mental phenomena is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the sense field of mental phenomena.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of mental phenomena is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //üîΩsa'i khams @477b nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // sa'i khams @477b nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the condition of contact through the coming together of mental phenomena.üîΩThe earth element is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so //üîΩchu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so // chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the earth element.üîΩThe water element is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so //üîΩme'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so // me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the water element.üîΩThe fire element is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so //üîΩrlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so // rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the fire element.üîΩThe wind element is the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The space element is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so // rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The realm of space is also the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe realm of consciousness is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so //üîΩma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so // ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the realm of consciousness.üîΩIgnorance is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //üîΩ'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o // 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also ignorance.üîΩFormations are also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //üîΩrnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also formations.üîΩConsciousness is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o // ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also consciousness.üîΩName and form are also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also name and form.

original: skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The six sense sources are also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug @478a *//üîΩgo / reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug @478a *// go / reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and omniscience is the six sense fields.üîΩContact is omniscience,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o //üîΩtshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o // tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and omniscience is contact.üîΩSensation is omniscience,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //üîΩsred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o // sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and omniscience is sensation.üîΩCraving is omniscience,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o //üîΩlen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o // len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and omniscience is craving.üîΩClinging is omniscience,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o //üîΩsrid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o // srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and omniscience is clinging.üîΩBecoming is omniscience,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o //üîΩskye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o // skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: and omniscience is becoming.üîΩBirth is omniscience,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o //
translated: and omniscience is birth.

original: rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Aging and death are omniscience,üîΩand omniscience is aging and death.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o //üîΩsbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is old age and death.üîΩThe perfection of giving is the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩtshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is the perfection of giving.üîΩThe perfection of morality is the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is the perfection of morality.üîΩThe perfection of patience is the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩbrtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is the perfection of patience.üîΩThe perfection of perseverance is the knowledge of all aspects;

original: @478b rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: @478b rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The perfection of meditative stabilization is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the perfection of meditative stabilization.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩnang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the perfection of wisdom.üîΩInner emptiness is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //üîΩphyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do // phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is inner emptiness.üîΩOuter emptiness is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do //üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do // phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is outer emptiness.üîΩInner and outer emptiness is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of the great is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do //üîΩdon dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do // don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of the great.üîΩThe emptiness of the ultimate is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of the ultimate.üîΩThe emptiness of the conditioned is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus @479a *// ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: 'dus @479a *// ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of the unlimited.üîΩThe emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩdor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.üîΩThe emptiness of non-rejection is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩrang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of non-rejection.üîΩThe emptiness of inherent existence is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //üîΩchos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do // chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of inherent existence.üîΩThe emptiness of all phenomena is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of defining characteristics.üîΩThe emptiness of non-apprehension is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩdngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of non-apprehension.üîΩThe emptiness of non-things is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam @479b pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam @479b pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of non-things.üîΩThe emptiness of essential nature is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //üîΩdran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the applications of mindfulness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //üîΩyang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so // yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the right efforts.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so //üîΩrdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The right efforts are the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the legs of miraculous power.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //üîΩdbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so // dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The legs of miraculous power are the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe knowledge of all aspects is the faculties.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so //
translated: The faculties are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the powers.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so //üîΩbyang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so // byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The powers are the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe limbs of awakening are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //üîΩ'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the limbs of awakening.üîΩThe noble eightfold path is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: @480a *// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //üîΩ'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: @480a *// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the noble eightfold path.üîΩThe noble truths are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //üîΩbsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so // bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the noble truths.üîΩThe concentrations are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so //üîΩtshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so // tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the concentrations.üîΩThe immeasurables are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The formless absorptions are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //üîΩrnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so // rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the formless absorptions.üîΩLiberation is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so //üîΩmthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is liberation.üîΩThe serial absorptions are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //üîΩrnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the serial absorptions.üîΩThe emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / @480b smon pa med pa'o /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / @480b smon pa med pa'o /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The superknowledges are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so //üîΩting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so // ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
